title: Jamie Lynn Spears' strength for injured daughter Maddie revealed after teen pregnancy scandal that rocked the world
text:
Jamie Lynn Spears' strength for injured daughter Maddie revealed after teen pregnancy scandal that rocked the world Britney Spears' younger sister was just a teenager when she fell pregnant with daughter Maddie, now eight. Jamie Lynn Spears is currently at daughter Maddie Aldridge’s bedside following an ATV accident that reportedly left the eight-year-old seriously injured. 
The younger sister of Britney Spears has always been a pillar of strength for Maddie, ever since she discovered her shock pregnancy at the age of 16. 
Jamie Lynn, now 25, was a rising TV star with her own Nickelodeon show, Zoey 101, when she fell pregnant with then-boyfriend Casey Aldridge, sparking a scandal that dominated the headlines. 
But throughout the intense media glare and afterwards, the teenager remained strong and always out Maddie first, retreating from the spotlight to raise her daughter in peace. Jamie Lynn with daughter Maddie in her 2016 TLC documentary, When The Lights Go Out (Photo: TLC) Jamie Lynn spoke about her strength for Maddie after the teen pregnancy shock (Photo: TLC) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Jamie Lynn Spear's can't hold in in during 'tell all' documentary Share this video Watch Next 
Jamie Lynn opened up about her teen pregnancy scandal in a wide-reaching TLC documentary, When The Lights Go Out, released last year. 
“There was so much chaos at the time when I announced I was pregnant. My family were here with me but we had a lot of agents and managers on the phone saying ‘damage control, what do we do?’ It was a real scandal situation at the time.” 
“I basically hid for three weeks in the house with two security men while the story went out,” recalled Jamie. “Finally, once things simmered down it was time for me to say, ‘What are you going to go? Who are you? Do you even know who you are outside this business?’ 
"Even at 16 I said, ‘I need to get out of here, buy some land and put a big ass gate around it.’ And that’s what I did. 
“I got away from it all and I was a mother, figuring out who I was as a woman at the same time. It was one of the most important things I ever did in my life because I was a child then, I needed to grow up outside the world’s view. 
“I don’t want my story to be the girl who got 16 and pregnant and that be the thing I’m remembered for. I want to be remembered for something more than that.” Read More Jamie Lynn has described Maddie as her best friend (Photo: TLC) Jamie Lynn was just a teen when she fell pregnant (Photo: TLC) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Jamie Lynn Spears shares sweet video of Maddie reading prayer Share this video Watch Next 
Jamie Lynn had been dating her first boyfriend Casey when she discovered her pregnancy, during a break back home from work in Los Angeles. 
“I remember I kept getting sick and throwing up,” recalled Jamie Lynn. “My friend said, ‘You don’t think you could be pregnant?’ I said, ‘No, not possible!’ She said, ‘Let’s get our friend to buy a pregnancy test’ so we stopped to get gas and she said to go take the test, as we didn’t want to do it at home. 
“I went into the BP [garage] and took a pregnancy test… The test was positive and I was pregnant. So I got the news in the ladies’ room at the BP. Sums it all up.” Jamie Lynn with her father in the TLC documentary (Photo: TLC) Jamie Lynn said the days after her teen pregnancy announcement were difficult (Photo: TLC) Read More How is Jamie Lynn Spears related to Britney? Daughter Maddie is in 'serious condition' after ATV accident 
Jamie Lynn was scared about telling her parents, so chose to break the news to her mum via a letter which she left in another room of the house. 
“I’m not going to sugar coat it,” she said. “Things weren’t great for a while there. I felt extremely guilty because I’d lived my life trying to be this perfect girl all the time and I was about to let everybody down. 
“I think you can’t explain why any woman [chooses] whether she gives her child up for adoption, has an abortion or keeps her child, that’s something only a woman can feel in her gut and that’s the decision I had to make for me. I couldn’t make it for anybody else.” 
“I knew that everybody was worried,” she added. “I was scared too but I think at the same time it was another factor for me to be the best mum I could be.” Jamie Lynn's dad has said he's proud of her (Photo: TLC) Jamie Lynn with her daughter and mum in May last year (Photo: FilmMagic, Inc) Read More Jamie Lynn Spears desperately tried to rescue daughter Maddie from pond after terrifying ATV accident 
Jamie Lynn and Casey were briefly engaged after the pregnancy announcement, but they later ended their relationship. Jamie Lynn is now married to businessman Jamie Watson. 
She said having Maddie pushed her to become the best person she could be - and after retreating from the limelight to care for her daughter, she chose to pursue a music career in order to provide the best for her daughter. 
“After I had Maddie, I had to figure out how to provide for her, what can I do?” said Jamie Lynn, who decided to move to Nashville and pursue a music career when Maddie was one year old. 
She had guitar and voice lessons in order to “better herself” and be the best musician she could be for Maddie. 
“I’m driven to do this for that baby girl.” she said. 
“I just want to be a good mum who makes her little girl proud.” Jamie Lynn and Maddie with Jamie Lynn's big sister Britney Spears Jamie Lynn is a country star in her own right (Photo: Getty Images North America) 
Like many working mums, the star admitted feeling guilty at times when she’s away for work, as she prefers to be with her daughter everyday. 
“It’s an uneasy feeling any time you leave your child for any period of time,” she said before one work trip. “I’ll be away a little bit longer this time as I’m working on our future. That’s what I have to keep reminding myself but it doesn’t help a guilty mum.” 
“I never wanted to seem like I’m not putting her as my first priority, I always want to make sure I don’t let my age or anything else be an excuse for not being the best mother I can be.” Jamie Lynn, in her TLC documentary, had guitar and singing lessons to provide for her daughter (Photo: TLC) Jamie Lynn has said she wants to make her daughter proud (Photo: Jason Merritt/Getty) Read More Jamie Lynn Spears admits she found out she was pregnant at 16 in a petrol station toilet 
Maddie is currently being treated in hospital after US reports she was injured in an ATV accident on Sunday. It’s alleged the eight-year-old was out riding when the vehicle unexpectedly flipped over, plunging her underwater for several minutes. 
A Spears family rep has said: “The details the media are reporting surrounding the incident regarding Jamie Lynn's daughter Maddie are incorrect. 
"Right now the Spears family asks that everyone respect their privacy during this time and appreciates all the prayers and support for their family." Like us on Facebook
